title: Yasuo particle fix
body: So the high noon and project skins are missing particles on the knockup and autos for yasuo. if you look at footage from season 4 high noon yasuo and release project partcles to todays you can clearly see the difference. Please riot fix this the skins feel so much better with the effects. I used to could install them myself but it was considered a custom skin and as we all know it is rip. Please and thank you.

replies.body: Hey 1NST1NCT! Would you mind grabbing me screenshots of what you're seeing? :)

Hey my man ill just shoot you some links.

This is season 4 High noon yasuo gameplay. Watch when he autos there is a brown line that follows the sword tip. Also on the classic skin the particles are all there. Also this issue has been on reddit for awhile now.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dPKmtjZ4jTA
https://www.reddit.com/r/YasuoMains/comments/4la0wp/yasuo_particles_fix_guide/

Also the best way to see the difference is use bloodmoon OR classic yasuo in the practice tool and compare it with high noon or project right after. There are VERY obvious differences such as:
e q circle missing
auto particles missing
some q differnces
mini tornado underneath a knocked up target missing.

I love the high noon asthetic and it just feelsbad that this issue HAS been known forever and I cant fix it myself.
Thanks a bunch! :) I'll dig into this and sync with a VFX artist. ^^

Hey man I know this isn't the place for this. I Literally had a teammate run it down mid for 0 reason just cause nobody would dodge. He says its his 10th account to be banned and so I'm gonna give you the account name. 

L9 XANBOI

played fiddle and literally ran down my lane. My temper is testy as it is and he didn't help any.
